name: Alatyr
description:
Tree of life is dying.... you have to descend to his roots and find what is causing that the tree is dying. Have you guys the descent to the underground and see what lies there?

You playing as elf ranger who can jump,double jump,dash and shoot.

Input is very simple WSAD to move, MOUSE to shoot, and SHIFT to dash.

You will probably die a lot but if you learn to use mechanism of double jump and dash in right timing you will be able to complete last level. In this version only 3 levels is avaible,in future there will be a lot more also with quality improvments and boss battle and the end of the game.

If you encounter any bugs please let me know in the comments i will be grateful. (becouse there is will be propably a lot xD)
